item.title: Develop an Ethereum bridge with Rust
item.description: A blockchain bridge is a system that allows the transfer of assets between two different blockchains. It is a crucial component of the blockchain ecosystem as it allows the interoperability of different blockchains. In this article, we will develop a bridge between two EVM-compatible blockchains. We will use the Rust programming language. Rust is a programming language that is gaining popularity in the blockchain ecosystem. It is a multi-paradigm language that is safe, fast, and concurrent.
